meta.description: Reviews & Comments: `I have heard many concerns about the risks of vaccinations and immunizations for children and that they can be the cause of ADD/ADHD. Could vaccines cause ADD/ADHD?`
meta.keywords: Reviews & Comments: ADHD Causes, vaccines, children, vaccine risks, vaccines and autism, vaccines and ADHD, vaccines and ADD, ADHD Causes

title: Reviews
cleaned_text: Researchers have tried to determine the causes of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADD/ADHD) for decades. Thousands of possible causes have been examined — many debunked. Your concern about vaccines and ADD/ADHD may be an extension of the erroneous belief that autism is caused by vaccines. There is no evidence that vaccines cause either autism or […]
